snippet: The police reported that the remains of 20 people had been found.
abstract: Death toll in fiery derailment of train in Quebec rises with police reporting that remains of 20 people have been found, and 30 more people are still missing.
lead_paragraph: The police reported that the remains of 20 people had been found.

headline.main: Deaths Climb From Disaster in Quebec
headline.print_headline: Deaths Climb From Disaster In Quebec
